name: Run To Survive
description: A rogue elf in an enchanted woods.  What could be more fantastical than that?  But Monsters are on the way… and YOU have to figure out if you have the strength, stamina, instincts and reflexes to escape them all!  The more you leap over, the more keep coming at you!  Can you escape them all?  You will find the answers to these questions as you play - one thing is clear, you must run to survive.   (welcome to my over glorified endless runner)
